name: livestream-tool
description: Công cụ quản lý và phát trực tiếp thể thao

scripts.db:create: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const dbName = process.env.DB_NAME; const dbUser = process.env.DB_USER; const dbPassword = process.env.DB_PASSWORD; try { execSync(`PGPASSWORD=${dbPassword} createdb -U ${dbUser} ${dbName}`, { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('Database created successfully'); } catch (error) { console.error('Error creating database:', error.message); }"
scripts.db:create:test: node -e "require('dotenv').config({ path: '.env.test' }); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const dbName = process.env.DB_NAME; const dbUser = process.env.DB_USER; const dbPassword = process.env.DB_PASSWORD; try { execSync(`PGPASSWORD=${dbPassword} createdb -U ${dbUser} ${dbName}`, { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('Test database created successfully'); } catch (error) { console.error('Error creating test database:', error.message); }"
scripts.db:drop: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const dbName = process.env.DB_NAME; const dbUser = process.env.DB_USER; const dbPassword = process.env.DB_PASSWORD; try { execSync(`PGPASSWORD=${dbPassword} dropdb -U ${dbUser} ${dbName}`, { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('Database dropped successfully'); } catch (error) { console.error('Error dropping database:', error.message); }"
scripts.db:drop:test: node -e "require('dotenv').config({ path: '.env.test' }); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const dbName = process.env.DB_NAME; const dbUser = process.env.DB_USER; const dbPassword = process.env.DB_PASSWORD; try { execSync(`PGPASSWORD=${dbPassword} dropdb -U ${dbUser} ${dbName}`, { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('Test database dropped successfully'); } catch (error) { console.error('Error dropping test database:', error.message); }"
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create
scripts.db:reset:test: npm run db:drop:test && npm run db:create:test
